page.title: 11Tidy Tip
page.content: The Tidy Tip was started in January 1979,two men are being employed and work from 9.30am to 8.00pm.It cost Â£84,000 to start and Â£1,000 to Â£1,500 to run a week.Before the tidy tip was started it was waste land.No computers help the men with their work but sometimes they use them to count how many vehicles come in and out of the Tidy Tip.1,400 people use the Tidy Tip every day which would fill approximately 13 containers.Four trucks come a day so there would be some containers waiting all the time.Facilities haven't been updated since it started apart from replacement of some rubbish containers .In the summer the most popular rubbish is garden refuse.
